summary: Completed frontend testing of 3D Glass Configurator. Fixed Triangle cutout earcut import issue. All 12 features now working correctly including drag-and-drop, zoom controls, multiple cutout shapes, and price calculation.
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/pages/GlassConfigurator3D.js - Fixed earcut import from 'import * as earcut' to 'import earcut'

features_tested.1. 3D Glass Configurator loads on /custo: PASS - Page loads with Babylon.js canvas, all UI sections visible
features_tested.2. Add Single Hole cutout: PASS - Click Yes for cutouts, click Add Cutout, cutout appears on glass
features_tested.3. Cutout dimension label (H 50 mm): PASS - Label shows inside cutout with correct format
features_tested.4. Distance labels from 4 edges: PASS - Red distance labels show Left, Right, Top, Bottom in mm format
features_tested.5. Drag cutout to new position: PASS - Cutout can be dragged, distances update in real-time (tested: 425mm → 532mm left)
features_tested.6. Real-time distance label updates: PASS - Labels update immediately during drag operation
features_tested.7. Zoom In/Out buttons: PASS - Both buttons work, view zooms correctly
features_tested.8. Reset View button: PASS - Resets camera to default position
features_tested.9. Different cutout shapes: PASS - All shapes work: Single Hole, Rectangle, Triangle (FIXED), Hexagon, Heart
features_tested.10. Price updates with cutouts: PASS - Price updates from ₹0 to ₹787.74 when cutout added
features_tested.11. Add Another Glass button: PASS - Creates Glass 2, Order Items list shows multiple items, total updates
features_tested.12. Glass dimension inputs: PASS - Width/Height inputs work, 3D preview and price update accordingly

fix_applied.issue: Triangle cutout crashed with 'this.bjsEarcut is not a function' error
fix_applied.root_cause: earcut was imported as namespace (import * as earcut) instead of default export
fix_applied.fix: Changed import from 'import * as earcut from earcut' to 'import earcut from earcut'

context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3D Glass Configurator features working. Triangle cutout fix applied. Drag-and-drop works by clicking center of canvas where cutout is positioned. Use scroll_into_view_if_needed() before canvas interactions.
